go_data.justification: IGF-1 is mentioned to induce physiological hypertrophic response after cardiac injury and is involved in exercise-mediated physiological hypertrophy.
IGF-1 signaling is increased in physiological hypertrophy and MuRF1 inhibits IGF-1-dependent cardiomyocyte hypertrophy.
IGF-1 is involved in driving increases in contractile proteins critical to cardiac function and performance, implying a role in cell growth.
